EmailTemplate.name: Pretend Generic Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Getting better at SF
EmailTemplate.textOnly: When Becky returned to work from holiday, she noticed that something had changed about Maks. There was something not quite the same, but she couldn't put her finger on exactly what that difference might be. It was only when he ran his hand across his smooth chin that she realised - his goatie (a sign of power, intrigue, and plotting) had vanished. He was no longer the enigmatic mastermind she had once imagined him to be. How could their friendship possibly continue now? .....
